title: Kumquat and Fennel Smash From Craft Recipe
full_text:
Kumquat and Fennel Smash From Craft Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
1 serving
Makes
1 cocktail
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
kumquats
, cut in half
3
heaping tablespoons
chopped fennel
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/2
ounce
agave nectar
1 1/2
ounces
freshly squeezed orange juice
Ice
Fever Tree tonic water
Garnish:
1
kumquat
, sliced in rounds, on a toothpick
Directions
Combine and muddle the 3 kumquats, the chopped fennel, lemon juice and agave nectar in a shaker.
Add orange juice and ice. Pour the entire contents of the shaker into a
large old-fashioned glass, top with the tonic water and garnish.
Special equipment
muddler, cocktail shaker
Non-Alcoholic Drinks
Fennel
Summer Drinks
